modName: Dovahkiin and The Apprentice of Thuum Trailer
descriptionHtml:
Here I\'m showcasing my Apprentice of Thu\'um quest. This will allow you to teach the Power of the Thu\'um to one of your companions.
You can download the video in the file section and endorse to show that you\'re interested, and of course comment :-)
This is not only a gameplay mod but also a quest.

[youtube]fNsiO2QxJk4[/youtube]
author: Trailer
